entries.arrived_at_delivery: Stay here until the pick-up ship arrives.
entries.arrived_at_pickup: Stay here until the drop-off ship arrives.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Warning. Attack craft incoming. Pirate signatures detected. >
entries.autorewardbody: You have been paid 3000 credits for services rendered to the Talus Space Station.
entries.docking_complete_delivery: Couldn't go any better. Take care, pilot.
entries.docking_started_delivery: Cargo bay is ready and waiting, pilot.
entries.failed_destroyed: That didn't work exactly the way that we planned. We're scrapping the rest of your assignments. Return to the station if you want to try again.
entries.found_loc_d: Good work, pilot. Now proceed to this navigation waypoint and deliver the package.
entries.found_loc_p: This should be another simple one. Fly to this navigation waypoint and pick up the cargo. It's a pretty hot package, so be careful.
entries.hello_d: Good to see you. Standing by for drop off.
entries.hello_p: Greetings, pilot. We're ready to trade.
entries.quest_dock1_d: Move in close to the drop-off ship and press the 'U' key to dock and receive the cargo.
entries.quest_dock2_d: Move in close to the pick-up ship and press the 'U' key to dock and transfer the cargo.
entries.quest_location_d: You will need to pick up the cargo in the Corellia system.
entries.quest_rendezvous1_d: Travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the drop-off ship.
entries.quest_rendezvous2_d: Hyperspace to the Tatooine system, then travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the pick-up ship.
entries.title: Corellia System: Smuggle a Package to Tatooine
entries.title_d: You have been assigned another simple smuggling mission. Pick up the cargo in the Corellia system and deliver it to the ship waiting in the Tatooine system.
